6276.title: Science of Stupid
6276.description: Science of Stupid reveals through science experts exactly how & why adventures turn to misadventures.

7077.title: Brain Games
7077.description: Experts in cognitive science, neuroscience and psychology perform experiments and explore various components of the human brain and how it can be fooled.

10988.title: Supercar Megabuild
10988.description: Putting a fresh spin on typical car transformation show, the series embarks on an ambitious mission to transform an ordinary car into an extraordinary supercar.

15175.title: Cosmos
15175.description: Cosmos reveals how we discovered the laws of nature and found our coordinates in space & time by narrating the untold stories of the heroic quest for knowledge.

1000234013.title: World's Worst Weather
1000234013.description: The documentary highlights the impact of extreme weather phenomena and tales of those who survived them.

1000234015.title: Hubble's Amazing Universe
1000234015.description: The updated version of the documentary sheds light on some of Hubble's latest observations like exoplanets, astrophysical jets, and the bubble nebula.

1000234017.title: A Year In Space
1000234017.description: The film tells the story of what it takes to spend a year in space and have led NASA to understand what it means for humanity as we journey to Mars.

1000239283.title: Apollo 8: The Mission That Changed The World
1000239283.description: Apollo 8 astronaut Bill Anders sheds light on the incredible story of Apollo 8 and the environmental campaign that followed.

1260004291.title: Crowd Control
1260004291.description: A series of fun experiments reveal how easy it is to manipulate a crowd of thousands and solve some of the most annoying problems along the way.

1260004372.title: Car S.O.S
1260004372.description: Master mechanics Fuzz and Tim Shaw have their task cut out as they embark on undercover missions rescuing classic cars and returning them to their owners.

1260006530.title: Superstructures Engineering Marvels
1260006530.description: From the biggest plane to the tallest building, witness the extraordinary feats of engineering hidden inside the most spectacular man-made constructions.

1260007249.title: Incredible Machines
1260007249.description: This six-part series reveals the remarkable engineering principles that turned some of the machines into icons of their time.

1260007838.title: Apollo: Back To The Moon
1260007838.description: On the eve of Apollo mission's 50th anniversary, this special feature recounts the heroic adventure of the crew who contributed to the success of the mission.

1260008283.title: Apollo: Missions to the Moon
1260008283.description: Primary source media recount the key moments of NASA's Apollo space program and America's goal to land on the moon before 1970.

1260008323.title: The Armstrong Tapes
1260008323.description: This special uses Neil Armstrong's interviews to craft an intimate look at one of the world's greatest heroes.

1260010068.title: Chandrayaan 2: The Landing
1260010068.description: This movie details the account of Chandrayaan 2 mission from ISRO's Command Centre in Bengaluru.

1260029345.title: Ultimate Supercar
1260029345.description: The series offers a behind the scenes look at the design, engineering, and manufacturing process of the world's most desirable cars.

1260041502.title: Made In A Day
1260041502.description: The special breaks down how the biggest American brands on the back their swift logistics are leading the world in trade and distribution.

1260078726.title: Rays Of Change
1260078726.description: Delve deep into the various stages involved in building one of the world's largest single-location Solar Plants by an IPP.

1260102910.title: Brain Games: On the Road
1260102910.description: Brain Games is on the road, giving people the chance to test their brain power as they take on their neighbours in an epic battle of the brains.
